00041 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------   
00042 BodyPath::BodyPath(const BodyPath& that) {
00043         Copy(that);
00044         // Copy tags
00045         POSITION pos;
00046         CString key, value;
00047         for( pos = that.tags.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL; )
00048         {
00049                 that.tags.GetNextAssoc(pos, key, value);
00050                 this->tags.SetAt(key, value);
00051         }
00052         // End copy tags
00053         this->id = that.id;
00054         this->startFrame = that.startFrame;
00055         this->isManual = that.isManual;
00056         this->autoConfidence = that.autoConfidence;
00057         this->manualConfidence = that.manualConfidence;
00058 }
00059 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------   
00060 BodyPath& BodyPath::operator=(const BodyPath& that) {
00061         Copy(that);
00062         // Copy tags
00063         this->tags.RemoveAll();
00064         POSITION pos;
00065         CString key, value;
00066         for( pos = that.tags.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL; )
00067         {
00068                 that.tags.GetNextAssoc(pos, key, value);
00069                 this->tags.SetAt(key, value);
00070         }
00071         // End copy tags
00072         this->id = that.id;
00073         this->startFrame = that.startFrame;
00074         this->isManual = that.isManual;
00075         this->autoConfidence = that.autoConfidence;
00076         this->manualConfidence = that.manualConfidence;
00077         return *this;
00078 }

00088 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 double BodyPath::GetHeight() {
00090         double h = 0;
00091         for (int i=0; i < this->GetCount(); i++) {
00092                 h += this->GetAt(i).height;
00093         }
00094         h /= this->GetCount();
00095         return h;
00096 }
00097 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 double BodyPath::GetWidth() {
00099         double w = 0;
00100         for (int i=0; i < this->GetCount(); i++) {
00101                 w += this->GetAt(i).width;
00102         }
00103         w /= this->GetCount();
00104         return w;
00105 }
00106 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 double BodyPath::GetConfidence() {
00108         double c = 0;
00109         int count = 0;
00110         for (int i=0; i < this->GetCount(); i++) {
00111                 double cc = this->GetAt(i).confidence;
00112                 if (Double::IsNaN(cc) ||  cc > 1 || cc < 0)
00113                         this->GetAt(i).confidence = 0;
00114                 if (this->GetAt(i).visible) {
00115                         c += this->GetAt(i).confidence;
00116                         count++;
00117                 }
00118         }
00119         if (!count)
00120                 return 0;
00121         else 
00122                 return c/count;
00123 }
00124 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 double BodyPath::Compare(BodyPath* that) {
00126         // find first and last common frame
00127         int b = max(this->startFrame, that->startFrame);
00128         int e = min(this->startFrame+this->GetCount(), that->GetCount()+that->startFrame);
00129         
00130         // if no common subsequence found, return large number
00131         if (b >= e)
00132                 return Double::MaxValue;
00133 
00134         // compute distance ( shift = =0)
00135         double dist = 0;
00136         for (int i = b; i < e; i++) {
00137                 dist += d(this->GetAt(i-this->startFrame).p, that->GetAt(i-that->startFrame).p);
00138         }
00139         return dist/(e-b+1);
00140 }
00141 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142 void BodyPath::Append(BodyPath* that) {
00143         this->Merge(that, false);
00144 }
00145 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 void BodyPath::Merge(BodyPath* that, bool fill/*=true*/) {
00147         int masterLast, masterFirst, slaveLast, slaveFirst;
00148         this->GetFirstAndLastVisible(masterFirst, masterLast);
00149         that->GetFirstAndLastVisible(slaveFirst, slaveLast);
00150         // Initialize joint path
00151         int b = min(masterFirst, slaveFirst);
00152         int e = max(masterLast, slaveLast);
00153         CArray<Step> joint; // merge array
00154 
00155         // Combine visible steps 
00156         for (int i = b; i <= e; i++) {
00157                 if ( i < masterFirst || i > masterLast || !this->GetAt(i-this->startFrame).visible ) 
00158                                 if (i >= slaveFirst && i <= slaveLast && that->GetAt(i-that->startFrame).visible )      // not present in master track, but present in slave track
00159                                         joint.InsertAt(i - b, that->GetAt(i-that->startFrame));
00160                                 else {
00161                                         // no info from any tracks => insert dummy stub
00162                                         Step s; s.visible = false;
00163                                         joint.InsertAt(i - b, s);
00164                                 }
00165                 else 
00166                         joint.InsertAt(i - b, this->GetAt(i-this->startFrame));
00167 
00168         }
00169         
00170         // Interpolate the gap between this and that
00171         if (fill) {
00172                 int bGap, eGap;
00173                 Step *sFirst, *sLast;
00174                 if (masterLast < slaveFirst) {
00175                          bGap = masterLast; eGap = slaveFirst;
00176                          sFirst = &this->GetAt(masterLast-this->startFrame);
00177                          sLast = &that->GetAt(slaveFirst-that->startFrame);
00178                 }
00179                 else {
00180                         bGap = slaveLast; eGap = masterFirst;
00181                         sFirst = &that->GetAt(slaveLast-that->startFrame);
00182                         sLast = &this->GetAt(masterFirst-this->startFrame);
00183 
00184                 }
00185                 for (int i = bGap+1; i < eGap; i++) {
00186                         double w1 = (eGap - i);
00187                         double w2 = (i - bGap);
00188                         Step inter;
00189                         inter.p.x = (sFirst->p.x * w1 + sLast->p.x * w2) / (w1+w2);
00190                         inter.p.y = (sFirst->p.y * w1 + sLast->p.y * w2) / (w1+w2);
00191                         inter.orientation = sLast->orientation;
00192                         inter.width = sLast->width; inter.height= sLast->height;
00193                         inter.confidence = 1;
00194                         inter.visible = fill;
00195                         joint.SetAt(i-b, inter);
00196                 }
00197         }
00198 
00199         this->RemoveAll();
00200         CArray::Copy(joint);
00201         this->startFrame = b;
00202 }
00203 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00204 void BodyPath::CutTail(int stopFrame) {
00205         int stopIndex = min(stopFrame-this->startFrame+1, this->GetUpperBound());
00206         this->RemoveAt(stopIndex, this->GetCount() - stopIndex);
00207 }
00208 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 void BodyPath::CutHead(int startFrame) {
00210         int startCount = max(0, startFrame-this->startFrame);
00211         this->RemoveAt(0, startCount);
00212         this->startFrame = startFrame;
00213 }
00214 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 void BodyPath::GetFirstAndLastVisible(int &first, int &last) {
00216         first = startFrame;
00217         last = startFrame;
00218         bool foundFirst = false;
00219         for (int i=0; i < this->GetCount(); i++) {
00220                 if (this->GetAt(i).visible) {
00221                         last = i+startFrame;
00222                         if (!foundFirst) {
00223                                 first = i+startFrame;
00224                                 foundFirst = true;
00225                         }
00226                 }
00227         }
00228 }

00314 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00315 void BodyPath::DrawTrackFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color, CNewVisionDoc* doc, int sigma) {
00316         CArray<IntPair, IntPair&> list;
00317         ListVisibleSegments(list);
00318         // for each visible segment 
00319         for (int n=0; n < list.GetCount(); n++) {
00320                 // === Ignore short tracks
00321                 int MIN_TRACK_LENGTH = 2;
00322                 if (list[n].id2 - list[n].id1 < MIN_TRACK_LENGTH)
00323                         continue;
00324 
00325                 // === Draw tracks
00326                 for (int i = list[n].id1+1; i < list[n].id2 /*&& i <= doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber*/; i++) {
00327                         CvPoint2D32f point1 = this->GetAt(i-startFrame-1).p;//Smooth(i-1+startFrame, sigma);
00328                         CvPoint2D32f point2 = this->GetAt(i-startFrame).p;//Smooth(i+startFrame, sigma);
00329                         cvLine(frame, doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(point1), doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(point2), color, 1, CV_AA);
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 // === Draw dwelling balls
00333                 bool dwelling = false;
00334                 CvPoint2D32f fDwell;
00335                 double dDwell;
00336                 for (int i = list[n].id1; i < list[n].id2 /*&& i <= doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber*/; i++) {
00337                         CvPoint2D32f point = this->GetAt(i-startFrame).p;//Smooth(i+startFrame, sigma);
00338                         CvPoint f = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(point);
00339                         bool dwell = ComputeDwellingState(i, 
00340                                 doc->bodyactivitymodel.m_pathSmoothSigma, 
00341                                 doc->bodyactivitymodel.m_dwellTime, 
00342                                 doc->bodyactivitymodel.m_dwellAreaRadius);
00343 
00344                         // just started dwelling now
00345                         if (dwell && !dwelling) {
00346                                 fDwell = cvPointTo32f(f);
00347                                 dDwell = 1;
00348                                 dwelling = true;
00349                         }
00350                         // continuing to dwell
00351                         else if (dwell && dwelling) {
00352                                 fDwell.x += (f.x);
00353                                 fDwell.y += (f.y);
00354                                 dDwell++;
00355                         }
00356                         // just finished dwelling 
00357                         if(!dwell && dwelling) {
00358                                 fDwell.x /= dDwell;
00359                                 fDwell.y /= dDwell;
00360                                 int r = min(max(1, round(DWELL_POINT_SCALE * dDwell / doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate)), DWELL_POINT_MAX_R);
00361                                 cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(fDwell), r, DWELL_POINT_COLOR, CV_FILLED, CV_AA); 
00362                                 cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(fDwell), r, color, 1, CV_AA); 
00363                                 dwelling = false;
00364                         }
00365                 }
00366 
00371 
00372         }
00373 }
00374 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00375 void BodyPath::DrawHeatMap(IplImage* motionmap, CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00376         CArray<IntPair, IntPair&> list;
00377         ListVisibleSegments(list);
00378         // for each visible segment 
00379         for (int n=0; n < list.GetCount(); n++) {
00380                 for (int i = list[n].id1; i < list[n].id2 /*&& i <= doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber*/; i++) {
00381                         Step s = this->GetAt(i-startFrame);//Smooth(i+startFrame, sigma);
00382                         CvPoint f = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(s.p);
00383                         CvSize axes = doc->floormodel.sizeReal2Floor(cvSize2D32f(s.width/2, s.width/2)); 
00384                         cvZero(motionmaptemp);
00385                         if (axes.height < 0 || axes.width < 0) {
00386                                 doc->Message(String::Format("ERROR: frame {0} body {1} width {2} height {3}", i, this->id, axes.width, axes.height));
00387                                 continue;
00388                         }
00389                         cvEllipse(motionmaptemp, f, axes, 0, 0, 360, cvScalar(1), CV_FILLED);
00390                         cvAcc(motionmaptemp, motionmap);
00391                 }
00392         }
00393 }
00394 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00395 CvPoint2D32f BodyPath::Smooth(int nFrame, int sigma) {
00396         int lo = max(nFrame-sigma-startFrame, 0), hi = min(nFrame+sigma-startFrame, this->GetUpperBound());
00397         CvPoint2D32f point = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00398         if (lo >= hi)
00399                 return this->GetAt(nFrame-startFrame).p;
00400 
00401         float norm = 0;
00402     for (int i=lo;i<=hi;i++) {
00403                 CvPoint2D32f p = this->GetAt(i).p;
00404                 float w = (float)probNormal(i, nFrame-startFrame, sigma);
00405                 norm += w;
00406                 point.x += p.x*w; point.y += p.y*w;
00407         }
00408         point.x /= norm; point.y /= norm;
00409         return point;
00410 }
00411 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00412 double BodyPath::GetMotionAngle( int nFrame, int sigma )
00413 {
00414         CvPoint2D32f point1 = Smooth(nFrame, sigma);
00415         CvPoint2D32f point2 = Smooth(nFrame+1, sigma);
00416         if (point1.x == point2.x && point1.y == point2.y)
00417                 return -10;
00418         //float temp = point1.y;
00419         //point1.y = point2.y;
00420         //point2.y = temp;
00421         double a = angle(point1, point2);
00422         return a;
00423 }
00424 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00425 bool BodyPath::ComputeDwellingState(int nFrame, int sigma, int dwellFrames, double dwellAreaRadius) {
00426         int nPts = this->GetCount();
00427 
00428         // not enough information to make a decision
00429         if (nPts < dwellFrames || nFrame-startFrame < dwellFrames)
00430                 return false;
00431 
00432         int lo = max(nFrame-dwellFrames-startFrame, 0), hi = min(nFrame-startFrame, this->GetCount()-1);
00433 
00434         CvSeq* seqPoints = cvCreateSeq(CV_SEQ_KIND_CURVE|CV_SEQ_ELTYPE_POINT, sizeof(CvSeq), sizeof(CvPoint), OpenCVmemory);
00435 
00436         // start from the most recent point 
00437         for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
00438         CvPoint point = cvPointFrom32f(Smooth(startFrame+i, sigma));
00439                 cvSeqPush(seqPoints, &point);
00440         }
00441         if (seqPoints->total == 0) 
00442                 return false;
00443         CvPoint2D32f center;
00444         float radius;
00445 
00446         cvMinEnclosingCircle(seqPoints, &center, &radius);
00447         return (radius < dwellAreaRadius) ? true : false;
00448         return false;
00449 }

00456 int BodyPath::GetLastVisibleFrame() {
00457         int last = startFrame;
00458         for (int i=0; i < this->GetCount(); i++) {
00459                 if (this->GetAt(i).visible)
00460                         last = startFrame+i;
00461         }
00462         return last;
00463 }
00464 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00465 int BodyPath::CountVisibleFrames(int f1, int f2) {
00466         if (f1 == -1) {
00467                 f1 = startFrame;
00468                 f2 = startFrame+GetCount();
00469         }
00470         int count = 0;
00471         for (int i=f1-startFrame; i < f2-startFrame; i++) {
00472                 if (this->GetAt(i).visible)
00473                         count++;
00474         }
00475         return count;
00476 }
00477 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00478 double BodyPath::GetDistanceCovered(int f1, int f2) {
00479         double distance = 0;
00480         if (f1 == -1) {
00481                 f1 = startFrame;
00482                 f2 = startFrame+GetCount();
00483         }
00484         for (int i = f1+1; i < f2;i++) {
00485                 Step s1 = GetAt(i-f1-1), s2 = GetAt(i-f1);
00486                 if (s1.visible && s2.visible) {
00487                         distance += d(s1.p, s2.p); // add only visible vertices, assume that invisible part were straight lines
00488                 }
00489         }
00490         return distance;
00491 }
00492 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00493 double BodyPath::GetAreaCovered(int f1, int f2) {
00494         // create OpenCv contour corresponding to the path outline
00495         CvSeq* contour = cvCreateSeq( CV_SEQ_KIND_CURVE | CV_32SC2, sizeof(CvContour), sizeof(CvPoint), OpenCVmemory );
00496         CvSeqWriter writer;
00497         cvStartAppendToSeq(contour, &writer);
00498         CvPoint pt;
00499         if (f1 == -1) {
00500                 f1 = startFrame;
00501                 f2 = startFrame+GetCount();
00502         }
00503         for (int i = f1; i < f2;i++) {
00504                 Step s = GetAt(i-f1);
00505                 if (s.visible) // add only visible vertices, assume that invisible part were straight lines
00506                         CV_WRITE_SEQ_ELEM( cvPointFrom32f(s.p), writer );
00507         }
00508         cvEndWriteSeq( &writer );
00509         // calculate the absolute value of contour area
00510         return fabs(cvContourArea(contour));
00511 }
00512 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00513 String^ BodyPath::ListVisibleSegments() {
00514         String^ msg = "";
00515         bool visibleNow = GetAt(0).visible;
00516         int i=startFrame;
00517         if (visibleNow) 
00518                 msg += String::Format("{0}", i);
00519         for (; i < startFrame+GetCount();i++) {
00520                 if (GetAt(i-startFrame).visible && !visibleNow) {
00521                         msg += String::Format("{0}", i);
00522                         visibleNow = true;
00523                 }
00524                 else if (!GetAt(i-startFrame).visible && visibleNow) {
00525                         msg += String::Format(" - {0}\n", i-1);
00526                         visibleNow = false;
00527                 }
00528         }
00529         if (visibleNow) 
00530                 msg += String::Format(" - {0}\n", i-1);
00531         return msg;
00532 }
00533 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00534 void BodyPath::ListVisibleSegments(CArray<IntPair, IntPair&> &list) {
00535         bool visibleNow = false;
00536         int i1 = 0;
00537         for (int i = startFrame; i < startFrame+GetCount();i++) {
00538                 // became visible
00539                 if (GetAt(i-startFrame).visible && !visibleNow) {
00540                         i1 = i;
00541                         visibleNow = true;
00542                 }
00543                 // became invisible or the end of path
00544                 if ((!GetAt(i-startFrame).visible || i == startFrame+GetUpperBound()) && visibleNow) {
00545                         list.Add(IntPair(i1, i-1));
00546                         visibleNow = false;
00547                 }
00548         }
00549 }
00550 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00575 void BodyPath::ListZoneEvents(FloorRegion *z, CArray<IntPair, IntPair&> &list, int outMax) {
00576         // "outMax": allow some frames out of zone to prevent "jittery events"
00577         int outCount = 0;
00578         bool inZone = false;
00579         int start = 0, stop = 0;
00580         for (int i = startFrame; i < startFrame+GetCount();i++) {
00581                 // wasn't in the zone got into the zone (only visible body can do that)
00582                 if ( !inZone && GetAt(i-startFrame).visible && z->IsRealPointIn(GetAt(i-startFrame).p) ) { 
00583                         start = i;
00584                         inZone = true;
00585                         outCount = 0;
00586                 }
00587                 // was in zone, now got out of the zone (or became invisible while inside the zone)
00588                 if (inZone && (!GetAt(i-startFrame).visible || !z->IsRealPointIn(GetAt(i-startFrame).p )) ) {
00589                         stop = i;
00590                         if (outCount < outMax)
00591                                 outCount++; // allow some time to re-enter;
00592                         else { // was out for too long
00593                                 inZone = false;
00594                                 list.Add(IntPair(start, stop));
00595                         }
00596                 }
00597         }
00598 }
00599 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00600 int BodyPath::BridgeInvisibleGaps(int maxLength) {
00601         bool visibleNow = true;
00602         int startGap = startFrame;
00603         int i=startFrame;
00604         int countGaps = 0;
00605         for (; i < startFrame+GetCount();i++) {
00606                 if (GetAt(i-startFrame).visible && !visibleNow) {
00607                         visibleNow = true;
00608                         if (i - startGap < maxLength) { // in gap in shorter than maxLength
00609                                 countGaps++;
00610                                 for (int n=startGap; n < i;n++)
00611                                         GetAt(n-startFrame).visible = true;
00612                         }
00613                 }
00614                 else if (!GetAt(i-startFrame).visible && visibleNow) {
00615                         visibleNow = false;
00616                         startGap = i;
00617                 }
00618         }
00619         return countGaps;
00620 }
